tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Artists (
  artist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artist_name VARCHAR(255),
  artist_style VARCHAR(100),
  artwork_title VARCHAR(255),
  artwork_year INT,
  artwork_medium VARCHAR(100),
  artwork_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE Artworks (
    artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_id INT,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    year_created INT,
    medium VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (artist_id) REFERENCES Artists(artist_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Artists (artist_id INT PRIMARY KEY, artist_name VARCHAR(255), biography TEXT)
CREATE TABLE Artworks (artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY, artwork_title VARCHAR(255), artist_id INT, creation_year INT, medium VARCHAR(100), price DECIMAL(10, 2))
CREATE TABLE Exhibitions (exhibition_id INT PRIMARY KEY, exhibition_name VARCHAR(255), start_date DATE, end_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE Artworks (
    artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    artist_id INT,
    creation_year INT,
    genre VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Artists (
    artist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    birth_date DATE,
    nationality VARCHAR(100),
    bio TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Artworks (
    artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_id INT,
    artwork_name VARCHAR(255),
    medium VARCHAR(100),
    year_created INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (artist_id) REFERENCES Artists(artist_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Exhibitions (
    exhibition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    exhibition_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Artwork_Exhibition (
    artwork_id INT,
    exhibition_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (artwork_id, exhibition_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (artwork_id) REFERENCES Artworks(artwork_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (exhibition_id) REFERENCES Exhibitions(exhibition_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Artwork_Tags (
    artwork_id INT,
    tag_name VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (artwork_id, tag_name),
    FOREIGN KEY (artwork_id) REFERENCES Artworks(artwork_id)
)
